definition: deep at night and all is quiet (idiom)
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)

sentences.english: In the stillness of night could be heard the ringing of a distant bell.
sentences.chinese: 更深人靜的時候可以聽到遠處的鐘聲。

sentences.english: I had a dream the other night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚更深人靜，我沉睡入夢鄉。
